wired.title: Apple Making a Car Isn't as Ridiculous as You Think
wired.topComment:
Things you need to know about the iCar:
1) You won't be able to open the hood
2) Battery will be hard-wired to the car
3) It runs on a proprietary form of fuel called iGas
4) You won't be able to fuel up on regular gas stations. You'll have to go to ...
